name: Lefebvre's Soliloquy
flavorText: The monk Lefebvre was famous for delivering soliloquies in battle. If they were eloquent, no one knows, for all who heard them died.
flavorTextHtml: The monk Lefebvre was famous for delivering soliloquies in battle. If they were eloquent, no one knows, for all who heard them died.

secondary.textHtml: Cyclone Strike reduces your damage taken by 45% for 5 seconds. (Monk Only) [40 - 50]%
